pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, March 4, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Saint-Jérôme, Quebec

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit La Compagnie Électrique Lion.

La Compagnie Électrique Lion
921, chemin de la Rivière-du-Nord

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
